name: Ahri
shortDescription: A mage assassin with mobility and charm.
fullDescription: Ahri is a nine‑tailed fox who uses her magical orbs to damage enemies and can charm them to walk towards her. She excels at burst damage and outplay potential.

name: Garen
shortDescription: A durable fighter with strong sustain.
fullDescription: Garen is a proud Demacian warrior who relies on his resilience and powerful spin‑to‑win ultimate. He is straightforward to play and excels at staying alive in fights.

name: Lux
shortDescription: A long‑range mage with crowd control.
fullDescription: Lux harnesses light magic to damage and blind enemies from afar. Her ultimate can turn the tide of battles with a massive burst of damage.
